allow: Bash(wc -l echo echo 'Files with old namespace (App\Domain\Flutterwave):' grep -r 'namespace App\Domain\Flutterwave' . --include=*.php)
Bash(wc -l echo echo 'New use statements (use Gowelle\Flutterwave):' grep -r 'use Gowelle\Flutterwave' . --include=*.php)
Bash(wc -l echo echo 'Old use statements (use App\Domain\Flutterwave):' grep -r 'use App\Domain\Flutterwave' . --include=*.php)
